author: Special Correspondent
text:
In less than a month, the Additional Commissioner of Police (traffic) in Chennai has been shifted again.

Abhay Kumar Singh, Inspector General of Police, enforcement, has been posted as the new Additional Police Commissioner, Traffic. He replaces H. M. Jayaram, who will take charge as Inspector General, Operations, an official release said.

It was only in January that Mr. Jayaram, former Inspector General of State welfare, replaced P. Thamaraikannan, the then Additional Commissioner. Mr. Abhay Kumar was earlier Inspector General, Enforcement.

Other transfers

Other transfers include that of R. Thirugnanam, Additional Commissioner of Police, Headquarters as Tirunelveli City Police Commissioner.

Su. Arunachalam, on return from central deputation, has been posted as Additional Commissioner of Police, Headquarters, Chennai.
title: Traffic police department gets second chief in a month
